name: SCHERING-PLOUGH HEALTHCARE PRODUCTS SALES CORPORATION, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Schering-Plough Healthcare Products Sales Corp. v. Commonwealth

parties: SCHERING-PLOUGH HEALTHCARE PRODUCTS SALES CORPORATION, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of October, 2004, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 259
SCHERING-PLOUGH HEALTHCARE PRODUCTS SALES CORPORATION, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.
